patthana5.2:1.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:2.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:3.1: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana5.2:4.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana5.2:5.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:6.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:7.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:8.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:9.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:11.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:12.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:13.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… āsevane dve …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana5.2:16.1: Vipākadhammadhammaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:18.1: Vipākaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:19.1: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:20.1: Vipākaṁ abyākatañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:21.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṁ …pe… sampayutte cattāri …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:22.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:23.1: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnaanupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:25.1: Anupādinnupādāniyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:31.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:37.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:38.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.
patthana5.2:39.1: Avitakkaavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:40.1: Avitakkaavicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:41.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalañca avitakkaavicāraṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ …pe… savitakkasavicāraṁ kusalañca avitakkavicāramattaṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:43.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana5.2:44.1: Avitakkavicāramattaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:47.1: Savitakkasavicāraṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:48.1: Hetuyā sattatiṁsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekādasa …pe… avigate sattatiṁsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:49.1: Pītisahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:61.1: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:62.1: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:77.1: Sekkhaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)

patthana5.2:80.1: Mahaggataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:101.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:119.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:120.1: Paccuppanno kusalo dhammo paccuppannassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:121.1: Paccuppanno akusalo dhammo paccuppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṁ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:122.1: Paccuppanno abyākato dhammo paccuppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana5.2:123.1: Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:124.1: Atītārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:125.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:126.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:127.1: Atītārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:128.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:129.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:130.1: Atītārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:131.1: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:132.1: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:133.1: Ajjhattaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:134.1: Bahiddhā kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:135.1: Ajjhattaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:136.1: Bahiddhā akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:137.1: Ajjhattaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana5.2:138.1: Bahiddhā abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:139.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:140.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:141.1: Ajjhattārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)
patthana5.2:142.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:143.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:144.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Ekaṁ.)
patthana5.2:145.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve.)
patthana5.2:146.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Tīṇi.)
patthana5.2:147.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cattāri.)
patthana5.2:148.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Pañca.)
patthana5.2:149.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cha.)
patthana5.2:150.1: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:151.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.)
patthana5.2:152.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ abyākatañca anidassanasappaṭighaṁ abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.) (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana5.2:153.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
